blogs.title: Tennis core trends
blogs.intro: We know (and love) the tennis skirt, but who knew that tennis players had so many styles and wardrobe options for both on *and* off the court? Whether you play tennis or just love the style, we've rounded up adorable tennis-inspired fits to help you serve looks (...see what we did there?) this summer.

content.description: Who says you can't be comfy and stylish at the same time? Radiate cozy vibes by pairing a stylish tennis skirt with your fave oversized shirt. Thanks for the chill-day outfit inspo, Piper.
Cultivate Lilia's angel energy by pairing a tennis skirt with cozy knitwear that is *perfect* for this summer's Y2K trend revival.

We can only hope that wearing an outfit inspired by the iconic Sofia Wylie will help us gain some of her confidence and dance skills. Want to recreate the look? Pair an *adorable* tennis skirt with a corset-style top.

Bucket hats and visors aren't *just* good at keeping the sun off your face, they make great statement pieces, too. Spice up your daily athleisure look with a sporty hat to take your outfit to the next level.

blogs.title: Colorful closet guide
blogs.intro: This spring, and going into summer, is all about embracing maximalist fashion: lots of colors, patterns and statement pieces.

content.description: It is time to add a bright-colored button-down into the mix. From a bold pattern to a bright spring color, this shirt will get a lot of use for throwing over capsule closet essentials like neutral tanks and trousers. Wear it as a light layer, as you would a blazer.
A spring and summer classic maximalist look is the bold flowy pants look. These pants are perfect for summer vacation, your favorite travel outfits and even wearing them to work.

Satin midi dresses have gone viral from bold spring colors to psychedelic patterns with many bright colors. The biggest trend is the satin midi dress with a cowl neck, but it is also emerging in corset and straight fits.
Say hello to the spring statement must-have, a colorful blazer. Blazers are it jackets and spring essentials for carrying a light layer for spring fashion, but they are super cute.

blogs.title: Find a perfect dress
blogs.intro: The perfect dresses are a girl’s best friend. They’re versatile, comfortable and fun. No matter what your shape is, there are amazing dress options so you can feel like a million bucks. To find your perfect dress style(s), it’s a good idea to meet us in the middle, at your waist  To find the perfect dress to fit your body shape, determining where and how the waist of your dress hits you will make all the difference.

content.description: Empire dresses are fitted through the bust and flowy at the bottom. This style is another winner for just about everyone. If you’re an apple or on the curvy side, empire dresses will help you play up the bust and minimize everywhere else. If you’re more petite, this style will help define your silhouette – especially in maxi length.

A line dresses are fitted to your waist, and then flare out gradually to the hem. This shape is minimizing the midsection, hips, and thighs, and draw attention to the bust half at the same time (depending on the neckline). There’s a reason that most bridesmaid dresses are A-line: It is singular most flattering fit for every body type. The good news is that you actually WILL wear this style again and again, because it comes in way more varieties than just heavy pink satin!

This style usually conjures up the roaring 20’s and flapper dresses. We love this style in a mini length, which modernizes it a bit. The key to pulling off a drop-waist dress is making sure that it doesn’t hug you anywhere. It looks best when it hangs freely. This style looks amazing on athletic, lean, and boxy shapes who don’t have much curve throughout the hip.

blogs.id: The cutest ways to style a bandana
blogs.title: The cutest ways to style a bandana
blogs.intro: We found some good ideas for styling a bandana:

content.point: Use the bandana as a hair tie
content.description: Add some flair to your everyday ponytail with a colorful bandana. Put your hair up in a scrunchie as you normally would, then tie a bandana around your ponytail as a stylish accent piece. It's cute and practical––and perfect for girls on the go!
For a super simple look, fold the bandana hot dog-style until you have your ideal width. Then, tie it around the back of your head.
If you're looking for a more daring look, braid the bandana into your hair. This style is perfect for keeping your hair away from your face.

content.point: Tie the bandana in the front
content.description: For a fun spin on the typical headband look, tie it in the front instead of the back. This keeps the tie front and center, making the knot a part of your look.

content.point: Tie the bandana in the front
content.description: For a fun spin on the typical headband look, tie it in the front instead of the back. This keeps the tie front and center, making the knot a part of your look.

blogs.id: Metallic eyeshadows are the ultimate summer beauty trend
blogs.title: Metallic eyeshadows are the ultimate summer beauty trend
blogs.intro: The decision is final: Metallic eyeshadow reigns as the ultimate makeup trend this season. Summer presents the ideal opportunity for exploring fresh looks, and there's no better choice than this. Navigating through the options to determine the most suitable products for a new venture can be quite a task. Thus, we have assumed the responsibility of identifying five stunning metallic eyeshadows in shades perfect for summer. Prepare to radiate throughout the season. Embrace the shimmer and shine, as this summer is dedicated to all the enthusiasts of luminous beauty.

content.description: Prepare yourself for an abundance of dazzling shimmer - this particular eyeshadow means business. Without a doubt, it's destined to capture everyone's attention throughout the entire summer season. Available in a selection of ten distinct shades, this eyeshadow boasts an impressive level of pigmentation, ensuring that a radiant and luminous look is practically guaranteed. Amidst the array of irresistible shades, our top picks for summer are undeniably 'Celebutante' and 'Yes to Sequins.'

Attention, celestial royalty! Get ready for your eyes to captivate the entire season with Colourpop's extraordinary hue, 'Morpho.' This liquid eyeshadow is a trifecta of shades, each destined to create a striking and dynamic color shift. Prepare for a perpetual state of breathtaking beauty whenever you wear this shade.'

Our current obsession resides in the captivating hue named 'Mermaid Shimmy'. Frankly, the name itself prompted an immediate addition to our shopping cart. Notably, this eyeshadow boasts rapid drying properties and an impressive longevity. If you're seeking further inspiration from the depths of the ocean, be sure to explore the enchanting possibilities of 'Ocean Eyes'.

Indulging in the allure of moondust adorning your eyes is an irresistible notion - one that certainly captivates our interest. The renowned and iconic shade, 'Space Cowboy', boasts a dedicated and extensive fan base, and for good reason. This incredibly rich and vibrant eyeshadow possesses a remarkable staying power of up to 16 hours, promising a lasting and impactful gaze. Imagine it as a finely powdered disco ball, patiently awaiting its moment to grace your eyelids with its dazzling radiance.

blogs.id: How to dress like Kat Stratford
blogs.title: How to dress like Kat Stratford
blogs.intro: Following the 1999 release of '10 Things I Hate About You', there emerged a singular character who bestowed upon us a wellspring of fashion inspiration and unwavering confidence for years to follow: the inimitable Kat Stratford. Whether she was inadvertently delivering love-laden poems within the classroom or wholeheartedly embracing the fervor of girl band performances, Kat's seemingly effortless style left an indelible mark in every scene she graced. Should you find yourself yearning for that quintessential '90s romantic comedy aesthetic, your quest concludes here. Allow us to impart the art of embodying this essence in a mere few steps.

content.description: No rendition of the Kat Stratford aesthetic would be deemed comprehensive without the inclusion of a midi skirt. Your choices unfold in two distinct directions: the poised monochrome route or the curated charm of a printed selection. Furthermore, these perennial articles frequently grace the racks of thrift stores, presenting a captivating option for those attuned to secondhand treasures.

What other ensemble could conceivably accompany your outdoor sketching session, all while Joseph Gordon-Levitt endeavors to win the affections of your sister? These impeccable attire selections resonate with the essence of the '90s and 2000s, seamlessly blending comfort with practicality (not to mention the essential inclusion of pockets).
Kat effortlessly flaunts a long-sleeve tee in numerous pivotal scenes of the movie, yet we couldn't resist highlighting her post-paintball ensemble.

Kat's hair is always perfectly in order, no matter the setting. Emulate her effortless daily hair look by slicking back the front strands and gathering the remaining hair with claw clips. To recreate her iconic prom updo, gather all your hair into a high ponytail, create a regal circle of curls using a small curling iron, and then secure the style with bobby pins. And there you have it!

Kat boldly dons her signature pearls to challenge the status quo and grace the school prom. Consider adorning yourself with an elegant faux pearl choker or opt for one embellished with a distinctive charm. This choice is certain to infuse a dash of refined elegance into your ensembles, irrespective of the occasion.

blogs.title: Pick your summer persona
blogs.intro: Discover your ultimate summer aesthetic by selecting one (or all) that resonates with you. Once you've made your choice, we'll guide you through assembling the perfect ensemble to effortlessly embrace your selected vibe.

content.description: If candy-colored items consistently beckon to you, if you've never encountered a pink-tinted filter you didn't adore, and if you effortlessly identify with a certain Disney princess, then your vision of sun-soaked enjoyment involves reclining on an Instagram-ready pool float with a perfectly coordinated manicure. Your essence exudes sweetness, much like your vibrant aesthetic.

Eagerly anticipating the reunion with your camp comrades? Forever leading the charge to the dock? The time has come to shine. Merge vintage t-shirts and patterns, embrace earthy hues, and accentuate with handcrafted accessories—and rest assured, you're bound to claim the title of the cherished counselor this year.

Embrace the beach vibes! Now's the time to don classic essentials: well-worn cutoffs, effortless cover-ups, cozy slides, and relaxed knits. You're the embodiment of the girl captured on the 'Wish You Were Here' postcard.

blogs.id: Ultimate guide for the mermaid aesthetic
blogs.title: Ultimate guide for the mermaid aesthetic
blogs.intro: Imagine immersing yourself in all things mermaid-inspired, capturing the essence of the ocean in every aspect—think beachy shades, shimmering iridescence, delicate ruffles, and the elegance of pearls. Good fortune is on your side, as we're here to provide you with the ultimate compendium on everything mermaid.

content.description: Mermaid fashion thrives on textures, layers, and embellishments. Embrace crochet, corsets, and ruffles for a feminine beachy look. Choose ocean-inspired shades like soft greens, blues, and purples.

Elegant pearls are beloved by mermaids and us alike! Elevate your style with jewelry to enhance your coastal outfit. Embrace shells, layered gold bracelets, vintage rings, and, of course, an abundance of pearls.
Achieve the coveted effortless glossy look in your makeup. Simply blend in shimmer, incorporate pearl highlights, and work with an aqua color palette for a stunning dewy finish.

Embrace beachy, tousled waves to embody the mermaidcore vibe. Utilize a hair waver or opt for braids overnight, and you're ready to roll. Alternatively, enhance your natural curls for an even more authentic touch.

blogs.id: Spice up your back to scool wardrobe
blogs.title: Spice up your back to scool wardrobe
blogs.intro: Top Fashion Hack: Elevate your look with versatile accessories you can flaunt throughout the week. From trendy sneakers and chic bags to stylish jackets, these pieces effortlessly enhance any outfit. Not only do they exude a high level of style, but they also excel in reusability, making 'adore that!' a compliment you'll grow accustomed to hearing.

content.description: Opt for a fantastic pair of sneakers as your ultimate go-to footwear this autumn. With the perfect choice, you can effortlessly match them with a wide range of outfits, from flare pants to your homecoming dress. Our preferred styles carry a subtle touch of '90s skater vibe, setting them apart. It's important to note that these are far beyond your regular workout sneakers, so keep that in mind.

Ah, the classic September predicament: too chilly for just a light layer, yet not cold enough for a hefty coat. Say goodbye to your comfort concerns by embracing a solution that lies in a jacket that's more than a shirt but not quite a coat. This versatile piece takes charge from your early morning classes all the way to your journey back on the bus.

content.point: The bag (almost) too cute for school
content.description: Listen up, since you'll be toting a school bag daily, why not opt for a remarkable choice? These go beyond being mere backpacks: With their stylish and distinctive designs, they enhance your jeans, matching sets, and t-shirts, transforming each outfit you wear to school into something truly extraordinary.

blogs.id: Outfits inspired by your favourite 2000s movies
blogs.title: Outfits inspired by your favourite 2000s movies
blogs.intro: The allure of time travel is captivating. Past eras influence today's trends, like the 2000s seen in iconic movies. Think Elle Woods' pink wardrobe and Jenna Rink's party dresses. For a stylish update, find inspiration in your beloved Y2K films. Here are outfit ideas from our cherished new millennium movies.

content.description: Whoever said you can't combine scholarly pursuits with style clearly hasn't met Elle Woods. She's living proof that you can excel in both arenas while looking incredibly fashionable. As a Harvard alumna, she embraces an impressive array of professional ensembles, yet she defies the notion that her attire must be dull or lacking personality. Elle fearlessly dons her signature pink hues and confidently enters her classes, making a statement that personal style doesn't have to be compromised to command respect as a law student.

The fashion sense of Jenna Rink in '13 Going On 30' perfectly encapsulates her character—daring, driven, and genuine. This vibrant ensemble pays homage to one of Jenna's standout appearances in the movie, with each element reflecting her lively persona. Beyond its visual appeal, you can adopt this look to boost your self-assurance. Emulate Jenna's vivid makeup style or venture into a fresh hairstyle experiment—then infuse the ensemble with your own distinctive touch, creating a look that radiates confidence.

Gabriella's understated demeanor serves as a cornerstone of her character's resilience in the High School Musical trilogy. In contrast to her fellow film counterparts, Gabriella possesses a grounded and introverted disposition. Her fashion choices, though uncomplicated, contribute to setting her apart in the bustling landscape of East High, earning her the title of the school's understated 'it-girl', a role she shares with none other than Sharpay, naturally.

blogs.title: Four jewelry trends to try
blogs.intro: Let's face it: Completely revamping your wardrobe with each new season isn't always feasible. However, there's a simple and cost-effective solution to breathe new life into your existing collection – elevate your jewelry game. Here are four trends you should consider trying!

content.description: Embrace your inner Audrey Hepburn, as pearls are staging a significant resurgence this spring. Pearls stand as a timeless and sophisticated choice that transcends trends. Regardless of their size or form, pearls have the power to elevate any ensemble. While pearl huggies like these are our favorites, you can also opt for pearl necklaces or bracelets to make your style statement.

If you didn't catch it, layering necklaces is a major trend right now. You have the option to mix and match your current necklaces to craft a distinct combination, or you can purchase a pre-layered necklace stack. Our personal favorite is this teardrop and chain duo featuring a lovely pink pendant.

It's the ideal moment to introduce vibrant and striking accessories into your wardrobe. Looking to elevate a simple white tee and jeans combo? Give these lively beaded bracelets a shot. Not only do they infuse a burst of color into your ensemble, but they also bring a smile to your face.

blogs.id: How to glow up your basic ponytail
blogs.title: How to glow up your basic ponytail
blogs.intro: Gym class is requesting the return of its mundane ponytail, but it's time to step up your game. Your mission: Elevate this uninspiring style to new heights. Whether you opt for a touch of intrigue or a dose of full-on glam, bid farewell to the ordinary basic ponytail.

content.description: Face-framing pieces are the perfect way to change things up...but turning those pieces into braids *really* elevates the look.
Arguably the easiest way to take your pony from stale to stunning is to turn it into a bubble style. This spring's upgrade? Ribbons.
This ponytail-meets-bun style was the hottest accessory at the spring '23 runway shows.
Lazy girls, rejoice. This look takes basically nothing to recreate, not even a brush...unless you really, really want to use one.

body.content:
The dramatic body type is tall, vertical, and angular, often exceeding 5 feet 5 inches in height. The frame is slender with an elongated structure and lacks prominent waist-hip definition, highlighting a distinct vertical line. Limbs are elongated, showcasing visible bone structure for a delicate and lean appearance. 
Square and narrow shoulders, are common. Prominent facial bones define the jawline, cheekbones, and nose. Eyes are typically small and straight or almond-shaped, while lips may be long, narrow, thin, or straight. 
Taut skin around the cheeks and jaw creates sharp contours, enhancing the overall striking appearance.
body.subtitle: Dramatic Clothing Recommendations
body.description: The Dramatic ID embraces sharpness in style, reflected in clothing with geometric designs. Dramatics excel in high-fashion trends. Solid colors are vital, accentuating form and angles. Crisp prints harmonize with their essence, avoiding blurry textures. Wardrobe highlights: tailored pieces with elongated lines, structured fabrics. Avoid excessive embellishments and color-blocking. Minimize 'disruptions' to honor the vertical line, favoring monochromatic palettes, deep neutrals, and refined detailing.

body.content:
The Classic image ID embodies an exquisite equilibrium between soft and sharp attributes throughout every aspect of the natural body. This fusion results in a poised and harmonious appearance that emanates a sense of symmetry and equilibrium.
The Classic Kibbe body type typically exhibits moderate height, generally ranging from 5 feet 3 inches to 5 feet 7 inches. Possessing well-proportioned dimensions, they strike a balance between being short and long-waisted.
Their silhouette reflects a harmonious interplay between the bust and hips, albeit leaning more towards a straighter line. Facial features are often characterized by a moderate and symmetrical allure.
body.subtitle: Classic Clothing Recommendations
body.description:
Classic body type should maintain style lines that honor body shape and symmetry, avoiding extremes. Smooth and symmetrical silhouettes with controlled edges are recomended—straight or softly curved lines, subtly tailored or slightly flowing, without overwhelming tailoring or flow.
A clean, unbroken silhouette is essential, reflecting elegance. Focused on a balanced 'head-to-toe' look. Symmetry is key; blended similar shapes whether slightly geometric or curved. Details should be clean, minimal, and understated, working seamlessly with the garment's smooth line.

body.content:
Gamines sport a lithe and lean physique, often displaying sinewy muscles, and a straight body shape. Their bust and hips remain flat, except for instances of excess weight, with a possibility of being slightly short-waisted. Typically under 5 ft 5 in, Gamines are petite in stature.
Pure Gamines boast angular, sharp, and narrow bone structures, sometimes described as 'delicate'. Their shoulders can either be square or tapered, leaning towards a narrow appearance rather than a wide one. Long arms and legs accompany their frame, while narrow hands and feet range from small to moderate.
Large eyes, taut cheeks, and facial contours characterize their appearance. Lips are typically narrow or straight, while their size tends to be moderate to thin.
body.subtitle: Gamine Clothing Recommendations
body.description:
The Gamine body type thrives in precision, with fitted and crisply tailored pieces featuring small, sharp geometrics. Aim for an overall outline that's sharp and straight. Utilize short horizontal and vertical lines for effective impact.
The Gamine body type should experiment with short, sharp, and narrow hemlines, or opt for short-cropped, well-fitted jackets. Embraced sharp edges and extreme tailoring for jackets and separates.
Details play a defining role in Gamine look. Integrated sharp necklines, small tailored accents, and crisp lapels for a balanced effect. Abundant details, small and sharp, contribute to lively essence. Colorful separates adorned with aforementioned details can work wonders for Gamines. Also, consider very tailored, slim dresses with sharp edges.

body.content:
The natural body type embodies a blend of horizontal features and blunt edges.
The natural body tipe is typically of moderate to tall height, often up to 5 ft 8 inches. Naturals possess angular characteristics with defined yet blunt edges. Their physique leans towards being muscular, yet maintains a lean and toned appearance. Hips tend to be flat, as does the bustline, while arms and legs may slightly trend towards elongation. The potential for long-waistedness exists.
Facially, Naturals exhibit angular and straight noses, accompanied by taut cheeks and lips of moderate size. Eyes are generally moderate to small, often accompanied by taut cheeks.
body.subtitle: Natural Clothing Recommendations
body.description:
The Natural style thrives in softly tailored shapes and a preference for unconstructed pieces. They should aim for a slimmer and fairly narrow outline, while maintaining a loose and effortless essence in your clothing.
Simplicity serves naturals well, with minimal details that enhance look. Naturals should opt for simple necklines and softly-edged shoulders or jackets. Embraced softer fabrics, particularly knitwear, which seamlessly integrates into style. Textured fabrics and natural materials such as raw silks, linens, and soft leathers complement the aesthetic perfectly.
In essence, Natural style flourishes through an artistic blend of patterns, textures, and colors. This organic and creative vibe resonates more effectively than a polished or glamorous approach.

body.content:
The Romantic body type is characterized by a distinct absence of sharp features or angles, instead favoring curves, rounded edges, and an hourglass or voluptuous frame.
Typically moderate to petite in stature, often standing 5 ft 5 inches and below. The Romantic body type exudes a voluptuous and soft appearance, accentuated by its hourglass figure. This includes a curvaceous bustline, hips, and a proportionally smaller waist, harmoniously emphasizing their curves. Rounded or sloped shoulders complement their appearance, along with small hands and feet.
Facially, Romantics are characterized by lush, full, and sensual features with rounded contours. They frequently showcase large, luminous eyes, full lips, and fleshy cheeks.
body.subtitle: Romatics Clothing Recommendations
body.description:
Romantics should wholeheartedly embrace their inherent curves and rounded features, consistently honoring their captivating hourglass figure.
Achieving this involves selecting soft and flowing silhouettes that elegantly showcase their lush curves, always ensuring a focus on waist emphasis. Employing gentle draping is an excellent method to achieve this effect.
Optimal fabric choices include lightweight materials that drape gracefully, along with soft woven fabrics. Incorporating sheer, ultra-soft, and ultra-shiny fabrics can further enhance the Romantic's distinct style lines.
Details should exude a soft, intricate, and feminine essence. When it comes to color palettes, soft pastels, watercolors, and vivid brights harmonize beautifully with your wardrobe. Alternatively, you can opt for rich, luxuriously blended hues to accentuate your captivating femininity.

answers.answerText: I look taller than I am

quiz.questionText: What is the shape of you shoulders?
What is the shape of you arms and legs, and how long are they?

answers.answerText: Short in proportion to your height
Very short in proportion to your height

quiz.questionText: What is the shape of your body?

answers.answerText: Long and Straight, even when gaining weight

quiz.questionText: What is the shape of your jawline?
What is the shape of your cheekbones?
